metadata.title: CVE-2023-30583 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: fs.openAsBlob() can bypass the experimental permission model when using thefile system read restriction with the `--allow-fs-read` flag in Node.js 20.This flaw arises from a missing check in the `fs.openAsBlob()` API.Please note that at the time this CVE was issued, the permission model isan experimental feature of Node.js.

criterions.comment: nodejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
